original_text: Remember this: Christ became a servant of the Jews so that they could understand God's true message. He showed them that God has now done what he promised to their ancestors.
korean_text: 내가 말하노니 그리스도께서 하나님의 진실하심을 위하여 할례의 추종자가 되셨으니 이는 조상들에게 주신 약속들을 견고하게 하시고

sentences.original_text: Christ became a servant of the Jews
so that they could understand God's true message.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 하나님의 진실한 메시지를 이해할 수 있도록.

sentences.original_text: what he promised to their ancestors.
